technique.name: sword of destruction
technique.attack: left step through haymaker punch to the head

steps.step: step back toward 6:00 into a neutral bow while executing a extended outward to your opponent's left inner forearm.
Draw your right foot back toward your left into a cat stance.
Execute a front snap to your opponent's groin.
step down into a neutral bow while executing a inward hand sword to your opponent's left neck.
